title: Replace the square root and PI symbols if necessary
Reformat the PRINT and PAUSE statements as appropriate for the target computer

note: For example, rewrite SIN X as SIN (X).
title: Put parenthesis around the arguments of built in functions
Eliminate the implied multiplication of variables. For example, rewrite X=ABC as X=A*B*C
Check the evaluation order of statements and insert parenthesis where necessary. For example, rewrite Y = V AB*C as Y=SQR(A*B)*C
Try several examples to verify the correct operation of your new
